snippet: Will Obama and Speaker Boehner be able to find enough mutual trust (and enough maneuvering room inside their respective parties) to reach a major budget accord before the fiscal world ends at year's end? Matt Bai thinks yes.
abstract: Will Obama and Speaker Boehner be able to find enough mutual trust (and enough maneuvering room inside their respective parties) to reach a major budget accord before the fiscal world ends at year's end? Matt Bai thinks yes.

headline.main: What Does Obama's Re-election Mean for a Debt Deal?
